parameters.name: AuthenticationProfileName
parameters.description: The name of the authentication profile to replace.

parameters.name: AuthenticationProfileContent
parameters.description: The new content of the authentication profile in JSON format. The maximum length of the JSON string is determined by a quota for your account.

nested_items.name: AuthenticationProfileName
nested_items.description: The name of the authentication profile that was replaced.

nested_items.name: AuthenticationProfileContent
nested_items.description: The updated content of the authentication profile in JSON format.
